notify_addonIssueMsg.message: See Browser Console for more details

notify_apiOnlineAutomaticModeMsg.message: Automatic Mode: Custom Gateway Redirect is active

notify_apiOfflineAutomaticModeMsg.message: Automatic Mode: Public Gateway will be used as a fallback

notify_uploadErrorTitle.message: Unable to upload via IPFS API

notify_uploadTrackingProtectionErrorMsg.message: Try disabling Tracking Protection (press ctrl+shift+j for more details)

option_useCustomGateway_description.message: Redirect requests made to Public gateways to the Custom gateway

option_publicGatewayUrl_description.message: Fallback URL used when Custom Gateway is not available and for copying shareable links

option_ipfsApiPollMs_description.message: How often peer count is refreshed (in miliseconds)

option_automaticMode_description.message: Toggle use of Custom Gateway when IPFS API availability changes

option_experiments_warning.message: Be warned: these features are new or work-in-progress.  YMMV.

option_displayNotifications_description.message: Displays system notifications when API state changes, a link is copied etc

option_catchUnhandledProtocols_descripti.message: Enables support for ipfs://$cid, ipns://$peerid and dweb:/ipfs/$cid by normalizing links and requests done with unhandled protocols

option_linkify_description.message: Turn plaintext /ipfs/ paths into clickable links

option_dnslink_description.message: Perform DNS lookup for every visited website and use Custom Gateway if DNSLINK is present in its DNS TXT record (known to slow down the browser)

option_resetAllOptions_description.message: Replaces user preferences with default ones (can't be undone!)

manifest_extensionDescription.message: Browser extension that simplifies access to IPFS resources
